Subject: Additional Info 
Date: Tue, 03 Jun 2008 13:12:00 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Hi I.- You might want to add that Epstein's publicist, Howard Rubenstein, is also the publicist for The New 
York Post where the article quoting Lefcourt's letter appeared. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
West Palm Beach, FL 33401 
Phone 
Fax 
EFTA00013882
